definition: to come to a decision/to fix on (a date etc)/to determine/to finalize/to nail down (a deal etc)
to hit/to strike/to tap/to rap/to knock/to rip sb off/to overcharge
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: Butt nailing the talk took months of preparation.
sentences.chinese: 但是，敲定這次談話花了斯科蒂六個月的準備時間。

sentences.english: It took over three months to hammer out the distributorship agreement.
sentences.chinese: 這份代理權合約花了三個多月才敲定。

sentences.english: I nailed down a contract to sell a thousand cars.
sentences.chinese: 我敲定了一個出售一千輛汽車的合約。

sentences.english: So we hammered out a deal that reflects  ideas from both sides.
sentences.chinese: 因此我們敲定了一項反映兩黨共同意見的協議。

sentences.english: And the two sides nixed a fourth agreement on taxation at the last minute.
sentences.chinese: 雙方在最後一刻敲定了第四次的免稅協議。

sentences.english: Starting location of the port area and construction program after finalizing , it is necessary to accelerate.
sentences.chinese: 港口起步區的選址和建設方案敲定後，要加快推進。

sentences.english: Interestingly enough, this should encourage the VC to work expeditiously on getting the transaction done.
sentences.chinese: 有趣的是，這將鼓勵風投迅速敲定交易。

sentences.english: Businesss is closed at this price.
But nailing the talk took months of preparation. Ms.
sentences.chinese: 但是，敲定這次談話花了斯科蒂六個月的準備時間。

sentences.english: However, any agreement could take up to a year to finalise.
sentences.chinese: 然而，最終敲定協議可能需要一年時間。

sentences.english: After much discussion the negotiators hammered out (came to) a compromise settlement.
sentences.chinese: 經過多次討論談判各方敲定了一個折衷方案。

sentences.english: Mon June 6th A pre-season friendly at Benfica is confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 月6日星期一做客本菲卡的賽季前熱身賽敲定。

sentences.english: Okay, that is to say our business is closed at this price.
sentences.chinese: 好的，那就是說我們的交易就按此價敲定。

sentences.english: Who is to star in the movie has not been finally decided yet.
sentences.chinese: 由誰來主演這部電影尚未敲定。

sentences.english: First, you need to decide on some basic ideas for a story.
sentences.chinese: 首先，你要給故事敲定一些基本思路。

definition: to reach agreement
to discuss/to deliberate
to confer/to discuss/to engage in talks
to discuss a matter with sb/to get in touch with/to arrange
to consult/to discuss seriously/to negotiate/to confer/negotiations/consultations
to negotiate/negotiation/talks/conference/CL:個|个[ge4]
"Red Poppies", novel by 阿來|阿来[A1 lai2]
lit. the dust has settled (idiom)/fig. to get sorted out/to be finalized
clapper-board/auctioneer's hammer/to beat time with clappers
to draw up/to draft/to formulate
to fizzle out/to come to nothing
to agree/to decide after consultation/to come to a compromise
official announcement (neologism c. 2018)
schedule/itinerary/CL:個|个[ge4]
to discuss
preparations/to get ready for sth
to declare/to announce/to proclaim
